00014 #include "icon.h"
00015 #include <qpixmap.h>
00016 #include <kiconloader.h>
00017 
00018 //#include "kame-24x24-png.c"
00019 extern const unsigned char icon_kame_24x24_png[1065];
00020 
00021 QPixmap *g_pIconKame24x24;
00022 QPixmap *g_pIconKame48x48;
00023 QPixmap *g_pIconWarn;
00024 QPixmap *g_pIconError;
00025 QPixmap *g_pIconInfo;
00026 QPixmap *g_pIconStop;
00027 QPixmap *g_pIconClose;
00028 QPixmap *g_pIconInterface;
00029 QPixmap *g_pIconDriver;
00030 QPixmap *g_pIconReader;
00031 QPixmap *g_pIconScalar;
00032 QPixmap *g_pIconGraph;
00033 QPixmap *g_pIconScript;
00034 
00035 void makeIcons(KIconLoader *loader)
00036 {
00037     g_pIconKame24x24 = new QPixmap;
00038     g_pIconKame24x24->loadFromData( icon_kame_24x24_png, sizeof( icon_kame_24x24_png ), "PNG" );
00039     
00040     g_pIconKame48x48 = new QPixmap(
00041         loader->loadIcon("kame", KIconLoader::Toolbar, 0, KIconLoader::DefaultState, QStringList(), 0, true ));
00042     if(g_pIconKame48x48->isNull() ) g_pIconKame48x48 = g_pIconKame24x24;
00043 
00044     g_pIconInfo = new QPixmap(
00045         loader->loadIcon("messagebox_info", KIconLoader::Toolbar, 0, KIconLoader::DefaultState, QStringList(), 0, false ));
00046     
00047     g_pIconWarn = new QPixmap(
00048         loader->loadIcon("messagebox_warning", KIconLoader::Toolbar, 0, KIconLoader::DefaultState, QStringList(), 0, false ));
00049     
00050     g_pIconError = new QPixmap(
00051         loader->loadIcon("messagebox_critical", KIconLoader::Toolbar, 0, KIconLoader::DefaultState, QStringList(), 0, false ));
00052     
00053     g_pIconStop = new QPixmap(
00054         loader->loadIcon("stop", KIconLoader::Toolbar, 0, KIconLoader::DefaultState, QStringList(), 0, false ));
00055     
00056     g_pIconClose = new QPixmap(
00057         loader->loadIcon("fileclose", KIconLoader::Toolbar, 0, KIconLoader::DefaultState, QStringList(), 0, false ));
00058     
00059     g_pIconDriver = new QPixmap(
00060         loader->loadIcon("exec", KIconLoader::Toolbar, 0, KIconLoader::DefaultState, QStringList(), 0, false ));
00061     
00062     g_pIconInterface = new QPixmap(
00063         loader->loadIcon("mouse", KIconLoader::Toolbar, 0, KIconLoader::DefaultState, QStringList(), 0, false ));
00064     
00065     g_pIconReader = new QPixmap(
00066         loader->loadIcon("player_play", KIconLoader::Toolbar, 0, KIconLoader::DefaultState, QStringList(), 0, false ));
00067     
00068     g_pIconScalar = new QPixmap(
00069         loader->loadIcon("math_abs", KIconLoader::Toolbar, 0, KIconLoader::DefaultState, QStringList(), 0, false ));
00070     
00071     g_pIconGraph = new QPixmap(
00072         loader->loadIcon("graph", KIconLoader::Toolbar, 0, KIconLoader::DefaultState, QStringList(), 0, false ));
00073     
00074     g_pIconScript = new QPixmap(
00075         loader->loadIcon("ruby", KIconLoader::Toolbar, 0, KIconLoader::DefaultState, QStringList(), 0, false ));
00076 }
